SQL.LOAD: SELECT company_id, dealer_id, cert_number, fromdate, todate, selection_on_created_date, selection_on_modified_date, selection_on_cert, selection_on_cancel, selection_on_billing, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, selection_on_newbusiness, file_header_temp_id FROM elita.elp_daily_obd_file_header_temp WHERE file_header_temp_id = :file_header_temp_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT D.Cert_Number, FromDate, ToDate, Selection_On_Created_Date, Selection_On_Modified_Date, Selection_On_Cancel, Selection_On_Billing, Selection_On_Newbusiness as Selection_On_New_Enrollment, H.File_Header_Temp_id, File_Detail_Temp_id FROM ELITA.elp_daily_obd_file_header_temp H , ELITA.elp_daily_obd_file_detail_temp D where H.File_Header_Temp_Id = D.File_Header_Temp_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_daily_obd_file_header_temp SET company_id = :company_id, dealer_id = :dealer_id, cert_number = :cert_number, fromdate = :fromdate, todate = :todate, selection_on_created_date = :selection_on_created_date, selection_on_modified_date = :selection_on_modified_date, selection_on_cert = :selection_on_cert, selection_on_cancel = :selection_on_cancel, selection_on_billing = :selection_on_billing, selection_on_newbusiness = :selection_on_newbusiness, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE file_header_temp_id = :file_header_temp_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_daily_obd_file_header_temp ( company_id, dealer_id, cert_number, fromdate, todate, selection_on_created_date, selection_on_modified_date, selection_on_cert, selection_on_cancel, selection_on_billing, selection_on_newbusiness, created_by, file_header_temp_id ) VALUES ( :company_id, :dealer_id, :cert_number, :fromdate, :todate, :selection_on_created_date, :selection_on_modified_date, :selection_on_cert, :selection_on_cancel, :selection_on_billing, :selection_on_newbusiness, :created_by, :file_header_temp_id )
